msItem.title: Anwar-i Suhaili.
msItem.note: There appears to be no record of the registration of the MS before it was entered in Codrington/Reade. It is not among the handwritten additions on the Library copy of Codrington. Defective at beginning and end. The first folio is an irrelevant replacement from the beginning of the Gulzar-i Ibrahim of Zuhuri, mentioning Ibrahim 'Adil Shah. The Anwar-i Suhaili here starts in the account of the discovery of the book in India. Some use of red for headings and punctuation.
msItem.incipit: Incipit (f2a): ... padishahan-i buzurg-ra dar qawa'id-i jahandari

bindingDesc.p: Lacquered binding with floral decoration, inside of covers with gilt decoration. Probably Kashmir work.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
